channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Baking Mad. Flutter helps Brinicle with his brioche baking for an exam, but the dough expands to a colossal size.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Mission: Big Bear. Therapy dog Sylvie uses her superheart to help the children on their first day at school.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family Fun Shorts
channel.desc: Henry Goes Pond Dipping. Henry takes his fishing net to a nearby pond in search of shrimp. But will he catch any.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle's Visit. Preschool comedy drama series. The Brooklyn-Bells take Waffle to Mrs Hobbs' house, hoping to show her how well behaved he has become.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Owl School. Baba wants to be an owl. Oona shows Baba that puffins are cool too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Run a Marathon. Jared is running a marathon, so JoJo and Gran Gran form 'Team Jared' to support him.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Twinkle Little Star! The friends discover a paper star in the toy house and a sky full of stars in Storyland.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Mother's Melody. Stop-motion animation. Tiny Clanger suggests that Mother Clanger composes a tune to play with the singing flowers in the garden.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: The Tombliboos Swap Trousers. In a magical forest, colourful characters have adventures. The Tombliboos' trousers get mixed up all over - in the Ninky Nonk, in the Pinky Ponk.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Geri Halliwell Horner - Rock 'n' Roll Soul. Rock out with Geri Halliwell-Horner in today's Bedtime Story.
